field_recall_reason_description: The connector could disconnect from the endotracheal tube, resulting in insufficient oxygenation of the patient
all-terms-rewrite: Medical Devices, General Hospital & Personal Use
title: Teleflex Incorporated Announces Worldwide Voluntary Recall of Select Hudson RCI速 Sheridan速 Endotracheal Tubes
description: Teleflex Incorporated (NYSE: TFX), has announced a worldwide recall of certain lots of Hudson RCI速 Sheridan速 Endotracheal Tubes. The recalled products are designed for oral or nasal intubation and are indicated for airway management.
